name: frankincense
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sticky substance that can be solid or in the form of a thick liquid, that produces a sweet smell when burned and comes from a tree that grows in East Africa and Asia: The three Magi or kings who visited Jesus were said to bear gifts of gold, frankincense, and myrrh. She sprinkles frankincense into a flame as part of the ritual.
Wicki58/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesIn Sana, the capital of Yemen, smoke from burning frankincense curls along narrow alleyways.The ceremony includes anointing with "holy oil", a mixture of frankincense and myrrh.Frankincense is known to have a calming effect on the nervous system.
